name: Colorful Return to Sender
desc:
Throw the exploding paint buckets onto the field and signs before they explode!
You can achieve victory by covering a certain amount of the entire field with paint before the competition ends! However, if your opponent manages to cover the entire field in the required amount of paint first, then you will lose...
